message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $9,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm looking for a price closer to my initial offer. Would you consider $9,250?
I've considered your counteroffer, Alice. Unfortunately, I can't meet you halfway at $9,250. My maximum budget is still $9,000.
